Home > external > metacyc > getEnzymesFromMetaCyc.m

getEnzymesFromMetaCyc

PURPOSE

getEnzymesFromMetaCyc

SYNOPSIS

function metaCycEnzymes=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

DESCRIPTION 

 getEnzymesFromMetaCyc
    Retrieves all enzymes and reaction-enzyme association information in MetaCyc

   Input:
    metacycPath  if metaCycEnzymes.mat is not in the RAVEN\external\metacyc
                directory, this function will attempt to build it by reading
                info from a local dump of MetaCyc database, and metacycPath
                is the path to the MetaCyc data files

   Output:
    model        a model structure generated from the database. The following
                fields are filled
                id:             'MetaCyc'
                description:    'Automatically generated from MetaCyc database'
                rxns:           Reaction id
                rxnNames:       Reaction name
                enzymes:        Enzyme id
                enzrxns:        Enzymatic-reaction id
                cplxs:          Enzyme complexes
                cplxComp:       Subunit components of enzyme complexes
                rxnEnzymeMat    A binary matrix that indicates association of a
                                specific enzyme to the reactions it catalyze
                version:        MetaCyc database version

    If the file metaCycEnzymes.mat is in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory
    it will be loaded. Otherwise, it will be generated by parsing the MetaCyc
    database files. In general, this metaCycEnzymes.mat file should be removed
    and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.

    Usage: model=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

    Hao Wang, 2018-10-31

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:
  • getModelFromMetaCyc getModelFromMetaCyc

0036 %NOTE: This is how one entry looks in the files
0037 
0038 %proteins.dat
0039 % UNIQUE-ID - MONOMER-8570
0040 % TYPES - Polypeptides
0041 % COMMON-NAME - D-carnitine dehydrogenase subunit
0042 % COMPONENT-OF - CPLX-5143
0043 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT-EXP - 23
0044 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT-KD - 23
0045 % SPECIES - ORG-6256
0046 % //
0047 
0048 %enzrxns.dat
0049 % UNIQUE-ID - ENZRXN-14974
0050 % TYPES - Enzymatic-Reactions
0051 % COMMON-NAME - (1S,4R)-iso-dihydrocarvone monooxygenase
0052 % BASIS-FOR-ASSIGNMENT - :MANUAL
0053 % CITATIONS - 10769172:EV-EXP-IDA-PURIFIED-PROTEIN:3419689584:caspi
0054 % COFACTORS - FAD
0055 % ENZYME - MONOMER-13964
0056 % PHYSIOLOGICALLY-RELEVANT? - T
0057 % REACTION - RXN-9435
0058 % REGULATED-BY - REG-12241
0059 % REGULATED-BY - REG-12240
0060 % TEMPERATURE-OPT - 35
0061 
0062 % A line that contains only '//' separates each object.
0063 
0064 %Check if the enzymatic proteins have been parsed before and saved. If so,
0065 %load the model.
0066 [ST, I]=dbstack('-completenames');
0067 ravenPath=fileparts(fileparts(fileparts(ST(I).file)));
0068 enzymesFile=fullfile(ravenPath,'external','metacyc','metaCycEnzymes.mat');
0069 metaCycProteinFile='proteins.dat';
0070 metaCycEnzrxnsFile='enzrxns.dat';
0071 
0072 if exist(enzymesFile, 'file')
0073     fprintf(['NOTE: Importing MetaCyc enzymes and reaction-enzyme association from ' strrep(enzymesFile,'\','/') '.\n']);
0074     load(enzymesFile);
0075 else
0076     fprintf(['Cannot locate ' strrep(enzymesFile,'\','/') '\nNow try to generate it from local MetaCyc data files...\n']);
0077     if ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycProteinFile),'file') || ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycEnzrxnsFile),'file')
0078         EM=fprintf(['The files of enzymes or proteins cannot be located, and should be downloaded from MetaCyc.\n']);
0079         dispEM(EM);
0080     else
0081         metaCycEnzymes.id='MetaCyc';
0082         metaCycEnzymes.description='Automatically generated from MetaCyc database';
0083         
0084         %Reserve space for 10000 enzyme complexs
0085         metaCycEnzymes.cplxs=cell(10000,1);
0086         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp=cell(10000,1);
0087         metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=cell(50000,1);
0088         
0089         %Get the information of protein complexes and their components
0090         nCplx=0;
0091         enzymeCounter=0;
0092         
0093         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycProteinFile), 'r');
0094         %Loop through the file
0095         while 1
0096             tline = fgetl(fid);
0097             
0098             %Abort at end of file
0099             if ~ischar(tline)
0100                 break;
0101             end
0102             
0103             %Add Enzyme id
0104             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0105                 enzymeCounter=enzymeCounter+1;
0106                 addMe=false;
0107                 enzymeID=tline(13:end);
0108                 metaCycEnzymes.enzymes{enzymeCounter}=enzymeID;
0109             end
0110             
0111             %Check if enzyme complexes
0112             if strcmp(tline(1:end),'TYPES - Protein-Complexes')
0113                 nCplx=nCplx+1;
0114                 nComp=0;
0115                 
0116                 %Reserve 100 subunits for each enzyme complex
0117                 Comp.subunit=cell(100,1);
0118                 metaCycEnzymes.cplxs{nCplx}=enzymeID;
0119                 
0120                 addMe=true;
0121             end
0122             
0123             if numel(tline)>13 && strcmp(tline(1:13),'COMPONENTS - ')
0124                 nComp=nComp+1;
0125                 Comp.subunit{nComp}=tline(14:end);
0126             end
0127             
0128             if strcmp(tline(1:end),'//')
0129                 if addMe
0130                     Comp.subunit=Comp.subunit(1:nComp);
0131                     metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{nCplx}=Comp;
0132                 end
0133                 addMe=false;
0134             end
0135         end
0136         %Close the file
0137         fclose(fid);
0138         
0139         %If too much space was allocated, shrink the model
0140         metaCycEnzymes.cplxs=metaCycEnzymes.cplxs(1:nCplx);
0141         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp=metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp(1:nCplx);
0142         metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=metaCycEnzymes.enzymes(1:enzymeCounter);
0143         
0144         % Iteratively replace all components of complexes into polypeptide
0145         % subunits
0146         for i=1:numel(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp)
0147             checkCplx=true;
0148             while checkCplx
0149                 x=0;
0150                 mat=[]; %Matrix for component of protein-complexs
0151                 for j=1:numel(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit)
0152                     [a, b]=ismember(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit{j},metaCycEnzymes.cplxs);
0153                     if a
0154                         x=x+1;   %record this value j, and the cplx id b
0155                         mat(x,:)=[j b];
0156                     end
0157                 end
0158                 
0159                 if isempty(mat)
0160                     checkCplx=false; % No complexs found among components
0161                 else
0162                     %go through matrix JB
0163                     for k=1:x
0164                         %disp(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit{mat(k,1)});
0165                         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit(mat(k,1))=[];
0166                         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit=[metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit; metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{mat(k,2)}.subunit];
0167                     end
0168                 end
0169                 
0170             end
0171         end
0172         
0173         %Preallocate space for 500000 enzymatic reactions
0174         metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns=cell(50000,1);
0175         metaCycEnzymes.rxns=cell(50000,1);
0176         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames=cell(50000,1);
0177         metaCycEnzymes.commoname=cell(50000,1);
0178         metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat=sparse(50000,enzymeCounter); % row: rxn, column: enzymes
0179         
0180         %Load enzyme and reaction association information
0181         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycEnzrxnsFile), 'r');
0182         
0183         %Keeps track of how many enzymes and reactions have been added
0184         enzrxnCounter=0;
0185         nRxn=0;
0186         
0187         %These contain the mapping between Reactions and Enzymes Loop
0188         %through the file
0189         while 1
0190             tline = fgetl(fid);
0191             
0192             %Abort at end of file
0193             if ~ischar(tline)
0194                 break;
0195             end
0196 
0197             % Get the version of MetaCyc database
0198             if numel(tline)>11 && strcmp(tline(1:11),'# Version: ')
0199                 metaCycEnzymes.version=tline(12:end);
0200             end
0201 
0202             %Check if it is a new enzymatic reaction
0203             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0204                 enzrxnCounter=enzrxnCounter+1;
0205                 metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns{enzrxnCounter}=tline(13:end);
0206                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}='';
0207             end
0208             
0209             %Add common name of enzymatic reactions
0210             if numel(tline)>14 && strcmp(tline(1:14),'COMMON-NAME - ')
0211                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=tline(15:end);
0212                 
0213                 %Remove HTML symobls
0214                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'<(\w+)>','');
0215                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'</(\w+)>','');
0216                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'[&;]','');
0217             end
0218             
0219             % I add one cell array rxns for checking existing ones by
0220             % ismember because I cannot manage field rxns in this function
0221             
0222             %Add enzyme name
0223             if numel(tline)>9 && strcmp(tline(1:9),'ENZYME - ')
0224                 
0225                 %Save the index in enzymes field to nEnzyme
0226                 [x, nEnzyme]=ismember(tline(10:end),metaCycEnzymes.enzymes);
0227                 if ~x
0228                     %disp(tline(10:end));
0229                 end
0230             end
0231             
0232             %Add reaction id, and rxnNames by concatenating unique common
0233             %names
0234             if numel(tline)>11 && strcmp(tline(1:11),'REACTION - ')
0235                 nRxn=nRxn+1;
0236                 rxns{nRxn}='';
0237                 rxnID=tline(12:end);
0238                 [c, d]=ismember(rxnID,rxns);
0239                 if c
0240                     nRxn=nRxn-1;
0241                     
0242                     %Check if this common name has been included by
0243                     %rxnNames
0244                     k=strfind(metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d},metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter});
0245                     if isempty(k)
0246                         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d}=strcat(metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d},';',metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter});
0247                     end
0248                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(d,nEnzyme)=1;
0249                 else
0250                     metaCycEnzymes.rxns{nRxn}=rxnID;
0251                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{nRxn}=metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter};
0252                     rxns{nRxn}=rxnID;
0253                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(nRxn,nEnzyme)=1;
0254                 end
0255             end
0256             
0257         end
0258         
0259         %Close the file
0260         fclose(fid);
0261         
0262         %Shrink the sizes
0263         metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns=metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns(1:enzrxnCounter);
0264         metaCycEnzymes.commoname=metaCycEnzymes.commoname(1:enzrxnCounter);
0265         metaCycEnzymes.rxns=metaCycEnzymes.rxns(1:nRxn);
0266         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames=metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames(1:nRxn);
0267         metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat=metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(1:nRxn,:);
0268         
0269         %Save the model structure
0270         save(enzymesFile,'metaCycEnzymes');
0271         fprintf(['New metaCycEnzymes.mat has been successfully updated!\n\n']);
0272     end
0273     
0274 end
0275 end
